title: PanduGeddonrozak
author: PanduGeddonrozak
created_time: May 16, 2022, 12:01:09 PMLast edit: May 17, 2022, 04:14:10 PM by PanduGeddonrozak
content: https://i.imgur.com/qRM9z8F.pngBrings DeFi to BitcoinThe first decentralised Bitcoin Trading and Lending PlatformGoverned by its community of self sovereign individuals.via the SOV governance tokenhttps://i.imgur.com/3zZIz3w.pngRules1. We are looking for active and informed posters.2. Only constructive posts will be counted towards this campaign. We are not looking for fluff comments, e.g. “This project looks promising.” or “This is big for sports” or “Wow, good luck to the dev team.” Instead, we are looking for substantive comments - comments that move the needle either positively or constructively/critically  - it’s up to you.3. 1 account per user. Any user found to have alternate accounts in the campaign will be kicked and denied payment.4. Posts in Games & Rounds, Investor-Based Games, Off Topic, Micro Earnings, Archival, bounty, and another signature campaign threads will not be counted.5. We don't pay for posts less than 80 characters in length.6. Users found to spam will be banned from the campaign and payment will be denied. Posts that are poorly crafted, deemed templated or fluff will not count.7. During the campaign you are not allowed to change/remove your signature, if you do so, you will be removed from this campaign, and will not receive any pay-out.8. Must join telegram bounty - https://t.me/+p2Ne3GqqBM9iNjM1Important: - 15 posts/ week are required. - We allow a max of 5 posts/15 posts on the local board per week. - Weeks start from Monday and Ends on sunday. Bounty Duration: Week 1: 16/05/2022 - 22/05/2022Week 2: 23/05/2022 - 29/05/2022Week 3: 30/05/2022 - 05/06/2022Week 4: 06/06/2022 - 12/06/2022MemberTotal Participnts Total per week $Legendary/
